Summary: Object appeared under chem-trails, traveling extremely fast,, turned at a 90 degree angle, traveled a few seconds and vanished.
divs: sighting details i was on ky hwy 52 traveling from lancaster to richmond. i noticed the object just before the hwy 1295 turn to the left. i grabbed my cell phone and called my husband to describe the event to him. the object was under the criss cross pattern of the "com\chem" trails traveling from west to east before making a high speed right angle turn to the north and disappearing. there was an aircraft flying at a high altitude emitting no trail that i noticed shortly after the cigar shaped object disappeared. the object was silver in color perhaps due to the sun reflection. i wonder if anyone else observed this event? i did not feel a threat from the object probably because it happened so fast.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Lancaster
There were no other sightings in Lancaster on or around September 3rd 2010
